message: Let's be fair, I take the lion's share but you get something too.  This is a good start.
I'll start with a strong offer, but be warned, I'm not backing down easily!
Let's split it down the middle. I'm confident we can find a good solution, but we need to start working together.
I'm willing to compromise, but I'm not giving up my advantage. You'll have to do better than that.
I'm willing to meet you halfway.  We can both do better than fighting over every dollar.
I'm not backing down, but I'm willing to give you a slightly better deal. Don't think you can push me around!
We're getting close to the end. I'm making a big concession here, but it's the best offer I can make. It's time to be reasonable and come to an agreement.
You're running out of time, Alice. I'm making a strong final offer. Take it or leave it!
I'm willing to compromise again. We can both get a decent share of the money.  Time is running out, but I'm still hoping we can find a way to agree.
